CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up task to MOT . CHI walks around and explores the toys on the floor . INV leaves the room
MOT kneels down and rolls a toy car on the ground
CHI turns and looks at the car
CHI runs over to the jack+in+the+box and grabs it
CHI squats down and plays with the jack+in+the+box
MOT watches CHI play with jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to turn the handle
CHI holds the jack+in+the+box while MOT touches the handle
MOT turns the handle on the jack+in+the+box while the CHI holds it
CHI moves to turn the handle
CHI starts to bang on top of jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to put jack back in box
MOT helps CHI put jack back in box
MOT puts jack back in box
MOT pushes jack down and closes jack+in+the+box
CHI turns handle until it gets stuck
MOT imitates turning motion with arm
MOT makes a circling motion with her arm
MOT continues to show CHI turning motion
MOT helps CHI wind up jack+in+the+box
MOT turns handle until jack pops out
CHI puts jack back down into box
MOT backs up and sits on chair
CHI picks up the car to examine it
<bef> CHI rolls the car on the ground
CHI holds the car up for MOT to see
CHI points over to the football on the floor
MOT sits in the chair while CHI continues to play with jack+in+the+box
CHI stands up and goes over to the chair
CHI grunts as she shakes the chair
CHI tugs chair and stands near the bears
MOT points to a picture on covver of book
CHI looks up at MOT briefly
MOT tries to get CHI attention while CHI is at table looking at activity boxes
MOT moves away paper lying on table
CHI pulls chair aside and looks under table
MOT takes CHI by arm and pulls her away from chair
MOT picks up CHI and takes her away from chair
MOT puts CHI on white chair
MOT opens book in front of CHI
MOT gives CHI book to hold
CHI points as she looks at picture below the one MOT was pointing to
MOT is pointing to picture of an airplane
<bef> CHI turns page . CHI closes book and wriggles in chair
MOT reopens book and puts it on CHI's lap
CHI puts book on table and gets off chair and then picks up football
MOT sits back up on her chair
MOT takes CHI off the chair
MOT bends down to get the football while CHI watches
CHI walks over to bag with toys
MOT sits down on chair holding ball
INV enters room at 09:47:23 to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 09:53:36 .
INV explains Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at table . INV gives CHI beads to hold . INV opens desk drawer and takes out Forbidden Object
INV clears toys off of table
INV slides beads across table to CHI
INV puts object on table and sets it into motion
<$=3> MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI stares at Forbidden Object and points to it
CHI reaches out to touch object
MOT takes CHI hand and holds it back
CHI looks down at beads on table
CHI reaches out to touch object
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up toys from Small Scale Activity and the seat CHI was sitting in at table . CHI starts to climb up onto chair next to desk
as INV leaves room CHI pulls out large chair to sit on
INV chats with MOT on her way out
MOT takes ball out of box
CHI receives ball from MOT hands
MOT stretches out her hands to receive ball
MOT points to other side of room
MOT points to other side of room again
CHI walks over to other side of room
ball drops and rolls on ground and CHI picks it up
CHI throws ball and it hits chair
CHI runs after ball to pick it up
MOT drops ball in box for CHI to see
MOT throws ball for CHI to catch
CHI tries to catch ball and misses
CHI runs up to box holding ball
MOT nudges CHI over to other side of room
CHI tries with great effort to sling ball in box
CHI throws ball but misses box
CHI throws ball in box again
CHI drops ball in box again
MOT takes ball from box and CHI picks up box
MOT takes box and gives CHI ball
CHI gives CHI ball but CHI wants to take box
MOT tries to give CHI ball
CHI pushes ball back to MOT
MOT puts box down and gets up holding ball
MOT gets up and nudges CHI down to floor
MOT pushes CHI down to floor
MOT walks over to CHI side imitating actions she expects from her
MOT stands behind CHI and swings ball in front of CHI and then throws it into box
<aft> CHI throws ball to box but misses
<bef> CHI throws ball aiming for box
CHI takes ball out of box and lifts it up above her head and drops it behind her hitting dustbin
CHI gets up with effort and goes over to dustbin
CHI lifts the garbage out of dustbin
CHI watches as MOT puts box away on table
MOT takes down another box and begins to open it
MOT lifts towel up to hide and then lowers it
CHI opens arms out as though doing peekaboo
MOT tries to get CHI attention as CHI moves over to table
CHI stretches out arm and lifts up box on table
MOT moves box back on table
MOT holds out towel for CHI to use
CHI runs away and pulls out large chair
CHI pulls out the strap of the chair
MOT drags chair CHI was playing with over near her
CHI tries to sit on chair
CHI cannot get on chair because it rolls away
MOT tries to help CHI by holding chair steady
CHI starts to pull chair around
MOT swings cloth up and down over her face
CHI plays with chair and pays no attention to MOT
CHI tries to sit on chair
CHI drags chair behind her and moves around room
MOT looks at the other boxes while CHI watches
MOT puts new box on her lap
MOT opens box on her lap
spoken with anger in her voice
MOT colors in front of CHI
MOT colors in front of CHI
MOT draws hand over hand with CHI
CHI scribbles furiously on paper in box which MOT holds in her lap
MOT makes drawing motions with her hand
MOT makes a circle shape with her hand
MOT makes circle shapes on the paper
MOT leans closer to CHI and looks at her while speaking
MOT stops CHI from throwing out more paper
MOT gives CHI a new sheet of paper
CHI tries to tear the paper from under MOT hand
CHI sounds as though she is sounding out the letters of her name
CHI draws on paper in box
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI leans against desk that the boxes are on
MOT has new box on her lap and prepares to open it
CHI takes book out of box
CHI stands in front of MOT holding book
CHI is turning pages of book
CHI moves closer to MOT and hands MOT book
MOT takes CHI onto her lap
MOT showsf CHI holograph by tilting book
CHI looks at pictures in book
CHI starts to kick desk near her foot
<bef> MOT puts her hand out and stops CHI from swinging her foot into desk
CHI begins to kick desk again
MOT turns back to the beginning of book
CHI closes cover of book and looks at it with surprise
CHI closes book and moves book up and down to see hologram
CHI looks around in a distracted manner
MOT puts book back into box
MOT catches piece of paper that falls from desk
